page.title: 05CUSTOMS MAY DAY LONG PRESTON
page.content: Each year the children from Long Preston school do Maypole dancing on the village green.The girls wear frilly blouses and silky skirts coloured red,yellow,blue or green.We do three dances:Barbers pole,Spiders web and plaiting.The boys do Morris dancing with sticks in their hands and bells on their feet. There is a ceromony to crown the new May queen.The infant class start the dancing with the shoemakers dance. After the dancing has finished we all go back to school led by Settle Brass Band.There we have competitions to see who has the best decorated cake,boiled egg or longest dandelion leaf. After Long Preston May Day the children go to other Gala's at Settle and Langcliffe on the decorated float.
